title: Apply Tiered Shipping Rates
description: The company has a tiered shipping rate structure (e.g., free shipping over $50). The system must apply the correct rate at checkout.

tasks.description: Calculate the subtotal of the items in the customer's cart.
tasks.expected_outcome: System correctly calculates the cart subtotal.

tasks.description: Compare the subtotal to the defined shipping tiers (e.g., Tier 1: $0-$49.99 = $5 shipping; Tier 2: $50+ = free shipping).
tasks.expected_outcome: System correctly identifies which tier the cart falls into.

tasks.description: Apply the correct shipping cost to the order total.
tasks.expected_outcome: System adds the appropriate shipping charge to the final price.
